column4: hello! i have a lexmark x1290 printer, scanner, coppier...i couldnt find any drivers for linux.... if i was to install wine, would the drivers work?!  just wondering
hello! i have a lexmark x1290 printer, scanner, coppier...i couldnt find any drivers for linux.... if i was to install wine, would the drivers work?!  just wondering
thats all i wanted to find out! kind of a bumm... they dont make drivers for linux! :(
oki will do see what happens
